Recap: Rex persuades Bo to exhume Gigi's grave when he sees that her date of death is missing. He has a "vision" that Gigi is still alive somewhere and he needs to get to her. Meanwhile, Shane calls Brody over to the house and tells him that he needs his help taking matters into his own hands to make Jack and Todd Manning pay for his mother's death. Brody tells Shane that he knows neither himself nor Shane nor Gigi behave the way the Mannings do. Yet Brody remembers that he has felt a need to "threaten " Todd not to tell anybody the secret about John being Liam's father and the fact that Brody is covering it up. So he has another "motivator" for Todd although he does not tell Shane. Meanwhile, all the people in Todd's life are still living with the "dilemma" about whether to believe or recognize the Todd they've known for 8 years who's really Victor, or original Todd. Bo tells original Todd that the police cannot help him and have to arrest him for trespassing when he goes to The Sun and current Todd calls the cops to have him removed. Bo tells him that all they have is Irene's word and that is not proof that he really is Todd Manning.
Transcript: Natalie: What's going on? I broke every speed limit in town getting over here.
Rex: Look at this.
Natalie: Oh, my God.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Blair: Oh. Weren't you gonna call first?
Téa: I'm not here to fight.
Blair: Good. Come in... because I am too busy just shaking my head. I cannot believe this. The guy we thought that was Todd ends up being Victor Lord, Jr.?
Téa: Yeah. The man with the line on his face...
Blair: Was telling the truth the whole time, which means my kids are his... except for Sam, who's Victor's. I just can't even wrap my brain around all of it, I'm telling you.
Téa: I called Viki and she confirmed it.
Blair: Yeah? I called John. So what'd you do? Did you walk out on Victor?
Téa: No. I slept with him.
[SCENE_BREAK]

Natalie: Rex, I am so sorry. Obviously it was vandalized. We get calls at the P.D. all the time about kids messing around and spray-painting headstones and tipping them over. I'm gonna call a report in right now, and I'll also check the security...
Rex: [Stammers] Wait. You think out of all of these headstones, that some kid just picked Gigi's and scratched out the date she died?
Natalie: Do you have another explanation?
Rex: She's trying to tell me something.

Natalie: All right. Let's just sort this out and see how many we've got. So what does this all add up to?
Rex: And don't forget 5--Gigi told me not to give up.

Rex: I think Gigi's still alive.

Rex: Ok, stop being so logical. This isn't about logic. It is something else, and I got to find her. I don't know how, I don't know where she is, but I'm not gonna turn my back on her. And if I'm wrong, you can check. What?

Shane: You think that Jack killed my mom and that his dad covered it up, right?

Starr: We better go. It's almost Hope's bedtime.
James: Hey, I know you're worried about how your family is dealing with this, but they will get through it.
Starr: You think so?
James: Well, if they're anything like you, I know they will.
Starr: Yeah. Watch me cave when Hope asks for another bedtime story.
James: Oh, you want Bobby's "Guide to Gaining Muscle Mass"? It always works on Ryder.
Starr: Ha ha! I don't want to scare her, but if I get desperate, yeah.
James: Just call me. I deliver.
Starr: How do you always know how to make me feel better?
James: Just doing my job.
Starr: Well, you're so good at it. Thank you.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Victor: Can we sue him or something?
Téa: Chances are, he's gonna sue us.
Victor: We'd win, though, wouldn't we?
Téa: I wish there were some equitable way to solve this.
Victor: Equitable. Listen. This paper would've folded if it wasn't for me. I doubled his portfolio, even in the recession. He doesn't deserve any of this.
Téa: Well, all the same, he hates you, and he'll do whatever it takes to get back what he thinks is rightfully his.
Victor: If he won't give up, I won't give up.
Téa: This man is your brother. Don't forget that. You really want to go to war with him?
Victor: Yeah. Bring it on.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Blair: I promise you, first thing tomorrow, I'm gonna wake up and find you a good lawyer because Téa, she is a shark.
Todd: And she's on his side.
Blair: And I am on yours. So just get in there and get some rest and promise me that you will stay away from Victor.
Todd: Won't be hard. I really can't stand the guy.
Blair: Whatever.
Todd: Yeah. I don't think I'm gonna be needing a lawyer.
